instruction: Develop a marketing campaign for a new coffee blend including a product name (text), packaging design (image), a 15-second advertisement storyboard (video), and a catchy jingle (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Product Name, 2. Packaging Design, 3. Advertisement Storyboard, 4. Jingle.
output-detail: 1. Product Name: Brainstorm and select a name evoking warmth and energy. 2. Packaging Design: Use cozy, inviting colors with modern fonts, showcasing the coffee's origin. 3. Advertisement Storyboard: Create a narrative that transitions from morning grogginess to energetic readiness, incorporating user experiences. 4. Jingle: Compose a melody that is upbeat and memorable, with lyrics that highlight the coffee blend's unique qualities.

instruction: Compose a bedtime story for children involving interactive elements (text), illustrations (image), voice-over narration (audio), and an animated story sequence (video).
output-abstract: 1. Story Creation, 2. Illustrations, 3. Voice-Over, 4. Animation.
output-detail: 1. Story Creation: Write a soothing tale with a moral, incorporating interactive questions to engage children. 2. Illustrations: Design accompanying scenes for key moments in the story, using soft colors and friendly characters. 3. Voice-Over: Record a calm, engaging narration of the story, pacing to suit bedtime. 4. Animation: Animate critical scenes with gentle motion to bring the story to life visually.

instruction: Design a virtual reality (VR) tour of the Solar System including the script for narration (text), 3D models of planets and moons (image), background space music (audio), and interactive VR scenes (video).
output-abstract: 1. Narration Script, 2. 3D Models, 3. Background Music, 4. VR Scenes.
output-detail: 1. Narration Script: Write engaging content describing each celestial body and its features. 2. 3D Models: Develop accurate, detailed models of planets and moons, considering lighting and texture. 3. Background Music: Compose ambient, spacious music that evokes the majesty of space. 4. VR Scenes: Create immersive, interactive scenes allowing users to 'visit' each planet and moon, incorporating educational pop-ups.

instruction: Prepare a gourmet restaurant menu featuring descriptions of dishes (text), photos of each dish (image), chef's commentary on selected items (audio), and a promotional video tour of the kitchen (video).
output-abstract: 1. Dish Descriptions, 2. Dish Photos, 3. Chef's Commentary, 4. Video Tour.
output-detail: 1. Dish Descriptions: Create appetizing and descriptive text for each menu item, highlighting unique ingredients. 2. Dish Photos: Photograph each dish in high-quality, using styling to enhance appeal. 3. Chef's Commentary: Record the chef explaining the inspiration behind selected dishes, noting special cooking techniques. 4. Video Tour: Produce a behind-the-scenes look at the restaurant's kitchen, showcasing cleanliness and innovation.

instruction: Create a digital art portfolio including a personal artist statement (text), curated artwork collection (image), behind-the-scenes creation process (video), and an ambient soundtrack for viewers (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Artist Statement, 2. Artwork Collection, 3. Creation Process Video, 4. Soundtrack.
output-detail: 1. Artist Statement: Draft a compelling narrative on your journey and style. 2. Artwork Collection: Select and retouch images of your best works for display. 3. Creation Process Video: Film and edit clips showing the making of key pieces, including commentary. 4. Soundtrack: Compile or create subtle background music that complements the viewing experience.

instruction: Organize a virtual conference on renewable energy with a promotional flyer (image), keynote speaker introductions (text), a series of educational webinars (video), and interactive Q&A sessions (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Promotional Flyer, 2. Keynote Speaker Introductions, 3. Educational Webinars, 4. Interactive Q&A.
output-detail: 1. Promotional Flyer: Design an eye-catching flyer that highlights the event dates, topics, and speakers. 2. Keynote Speaker Introductions: Write brief, engaging biographies for each speaker, emphasizing their contributions to renewable energy. 3. Educational Webinars: Plan and record webinars covering various renewable energy topics, ensuring high-quality visuals and sound. 4. Interactive Q&A: Host live Q&A sessions allowing attendees to ask speakers questions via an audio platform.

instruction: Produce a wellness mobile app featuring daily meditation guides (text), calming landscape backgrounds (image), guided meditation audio clips (audio), and intro animations for each meditation session (video).
output-abstract: 1. Meditation Guides, 2. Backgrounds, 3. Audio Clips, 4. Intro Animations.
output-detail: 1. Meditation Guides: Write instructions for various meditation practices, catering to different experience levels. 2. Backgrounds: Curate or create serene, calming landscape images for each meditation theme. 3. Audio Clips: Record clear, soothing guided meditation clips with peaceful background music. 4. Intro Animations: Design short animations that gently introduce users to the meditation session's focus.

instruction: Design a study aid for high school chemistry including explainer videos (video), infographics summarizing key concepts (image), practice problem sets (text), and podcast episodes discussing complex topics (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Explainer Videos, 2. Infographics, 3. Problem Sets, 4. Podcast Episodes.
output-detail: 1. Explainer Videos: Produce concise, engaging videos that simplify concepts using visual aids. 2. Infographics: Create colorful, informative graphics that outline and summarize fundamental principles. 3. Problem Sets: Compile and format a variety of practice questions, with answers and explanations. 4. Podcast Episodes: Record discussions with chemistry experts to provide deeper insights into challenging topics, encouraging a conversational tone.

instruction: Create a multi-language learning platform including interactive language exercises (text), country cultural guides (image), pronunciation practice clips (audio), and conversational practice videos (video).
output-abstract: 1. Language Exercises, 2. Cultural Guides, 3. Pronunciation Clips, 4. Practice Videos.
output-detail: 1. Language Exercises: Develop engaging text-based activities to practice grammar, vocabulary, and reading comprehension. 2. Cultural Guides: Assemble images and infographics about countries where the language is spoken, highlighting cultural norms. 3. Pronunciation Clips: Record native speakers demonstrating the correct pronunciation of key phrases. 4. Practice Videos: Create interactive videos simulating real-life conversations for speaking practice.

instruction: Develop a digital cookbook for healthy eating including recipe instructions (text), high-quality images of each dish (image), tutorial videos for cooking techniques (video), and narrated cooking tips (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Recipe Instructions, 2. Dish Images, 3. Tutorial Videos, 4. Cooking Tips.
output-detail: 1. Recipe Instructions: Write clear, simple steps for each recipe, focusing on health benefits and ingredient substitutions. 2. Dish Images: Photograph each completed dish in a visually appealing manner, emphasizing the vibrant colors of fresh ingredients. 3. Tutorial Videos: Demonstrate key cooking techniques through short, clear videos. 4. Cooking Tips: Offer practical advice and additional information through engaging, narrated audio clips.

instruction: Launch a virtual museum exhibit on Ancient Rome including a catalog of artifacts (text), high-resolution images of key items (image), an audio tour describing major exhibits (audio), and a 3D virtual tour experience (video).
output-abstract: 1. Artifact Catalog, 2. Artifact Images, 3. Audio Tour, 4. Virtual Tour.
output-detail: 1. Artifact Catalog: Compile detailed descriptions of each item, including historical context and significance. 2. Artifact Images: Capture clear, detailed photographs of each artifact, using lighting to enhance features. 3. Audio Tour: Record an informative, engaging audio guide through the exhibit, highlighting fascinating stories behind select items. 4. Virtual Tour: Create a seamless, interactive 3D tour allowing visitors to explore the exhibit space as if they were there.

instruction: Design a social media campaign for Earth Day including engaging posts (text), striking visuals (image), an inspiring message video (video), and a call-to-action audio clip (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Posts, 2. Visuals, 3. Message Video, 4. Audio Clip.
output-detail: 1. Posts: Draft captivating, informative text highlighting Earth Day's importance and suggesting actions for environmental protection. 2. Visuals: Develop impactful graphics and photos that draw attention to the cause, using Earth's beauty and vulnerability as themes. 3. Message Video: Produce a short, powerful video encouraging viewers to contribute positively to the planet's future. 4. Audio Clip: Record a persuasive call-to-action, urging community involvement in local and global eco-friendly initiatives.

instruction: Compile a travel guide for Tokyo featuring neighborhood overviews (text), photo galleries of attractions (image), narrated cultural insights (audio), and video walkthroughs of landmark districts (video).
output-abstract: 1. Neighborhood Overviews, 2. Photo Galleries, 3. Cultural Insights, 4. Video Walkthroughs.
output-detail: 1. Neighborhood Overviews: Write concise, informative descriptions of Tokyo's diverse neighborhoods, highlighting key attractions and dining options. 2. Photo Galleries: Capture and select vivid photographs showcasing the vibrancy and uniqueness of each area. 3. Cultural Insights: Record audio narration explaining significant cultural practices, historical tidbits, and etiquette tips. 4. Video Walkthroughs: Film and edit immersive tours of iconic districts, providing viewers with a sense of being there.

instruction: Create a fitness challenge application including daily workout routines (text), motivational images (image), instructional exercise videos (video), and upbeat workout playlists (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Workout Routines, 2. Motivational Images, 3. Instructional Videos, 4. Playlists.
output-detail: 1. Workout Routines: Compile diverse, scalable routines catering to various fitness levels, detailed through clear textual instructions. 2. Motivational Images: Design or curate powerful images with fitness quotes and success stories to inspire users. 3. Instructional Videos: Produce high-quality videos demonstrating each exercise, focusing on form and technique. 4. Playlists: Assemble energetic, motivating music playlists to enhance the workout experience.

instruction: Develop a storytelling podcast series involving scripting (text), episode cover artwork (image), original background music (audio), and engaging visual animations for promotional clips (video).
output-abstract: 1. Scripting, 2. Artwork, 3. Background Music, 4. Promotional Clips.
output-detail: 1. Scripting: Write captivating stories with compelling characters and plot twists, tailored for audio delivery. 2. Artwork: Create unique, thematic illustrations for each episode to intrigue potential listeners. 3. Background Music: Compose or curate fitting background scores that enhance the narration and mood of the stories. 4. Promotional Clips: Design brief, animated sequences highlighting key moments from the podcast, aimed at generating interest and sharing on social media.

instruction: Produce an educational toolkit on climate change for schools including an infographic series (image), detailed lesson plans (text), documentary-style explainer videos (video), and interviews with environmental scientists (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Infographic Series, 2. Lesson Plans, 3. Explainer Videos, 4. Interviews.
output-detail: 1. Infographic Series: Create visually engaging infographics that break down complex climate concepts into understandable tidbits. 2. Lesson Plans: Develop comprehensive, interactive lesson plans that guide teachers through the subject matter, including activities and discussion points. 3. Explainer Videos: Produce clear, factual videos that cover various aspects of climate science and impacts. 4. Interviews: Record insightful interviews with experts in the field, providing real-world perspectives on climate issues.

instruction: Organize an online art competition including a call for entries (text), a gallery of submitted works (image), a presentation video of the winners (video), and jury member feedback on selected entries (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Call for Entries, 2. Gallery, 3. Winners Video, 4. Jury Feedback.
output-detail: 1. Call for Entries: Draft clear, inviting guidelines and promotional material encouraging artists to participate. 2. Gallery: Set up an online platform to display submitted artwork, ensuring easy navigation and high-quality image presentation. 3. Winners Video: Edit a professional video showcasing the winning pieces and their creators, including brief artist statements. 4. Jury Feedback: Provide constructive critique and praise from the jury for selected works in audio format, offering insights into the decision-making process.

instruction: Launch a digital music album release including song lyrics (text), album cover art (image), behind-the-scenes footage of recording sessions (video), and teaser audio clips of the tracks (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Song Lyrics, 2. Album Cover Art, 3. Behind-The-Scenes Footage, 4. Teaser Audio Clips.
output-detail: 1. Song Lyrics: Carefully craft and edit the lyrics for each track, ensuring they convey the intended themes and emotions. 2. Album Cover Art: Design a visually striking cover that represents the album's overall vibe and aesthetic. 3. Behind-The-Scenes Footage: Record and compile engaging video content from the recording sessions, showcasing the creative process. 4. Teaser Audio Clips: Select compelling snippets from each track to tantalize potential listeners, encouraging anticipation for the full release.

instruction: Develop a series of educational short stories for children featuring text-based narratives (text), vibrant illustrations (image), narrated versions with sound effects (audio), and animated story adaptations (video).
output-abstract: 1. Narratives, 2. Illustrations, 3. Narrated Versions, 4. Animated Stories.
output-detail: 1. Narratives: Write engaging, morally enriching stories suitable for young readers, focusing on character development and plot simplicity. 2. Illustrations: Pair each story with colorful, captivating artwork that reflects the storyline and characters. 3. Narrated Versions: Record storytelling sessions, adding expressive voice acting and immersive sound effects for auditory learning. 4. Animated Stories: Transform the narratives into interactive, animated versions, adding motion and interactivity to bring the stories to life visually.

instruction: Create an online training module for digital marketing including an introduction to principles (text), infographic summaries of key strategies (image), expert commentary webinars (video), and podcasts on case studies (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Introduction, 2. Infographics, 3. Webinars, 4. Podcasts.
output-detail: 1. Introduction: Write a comprehensive overview of digital marketing fundamentals, laying the foundation for deeper exploration. 2. Infographics: Design engaging visuals that distill complex marketing strategies into easy-to-understand graphics. 3. Webinars: Produce a series of webinars featuring industry experts sharing insights and experiences on various digital marketing topics. 4. Podcasts: Compile episodes discussing successful case studies and the lessons learned, with guest speakers from renowned brands.
